key.name: file-path
key.description: The absolute path of the Markdown file whose contents will be displayed in the GNOME top bar.

key.name: start-line
key.description: The first line to display (1-based). If the value is less than 1, it will default to 1.

key.name: end-line
key.description: The last line to display. If set to 0, all lines after the start line will be shown.
